definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: His woollen cloth measures ten yards exactly.
sentences.chinese: 这块毛料刚巧是十码长。

sentences.english: I usually buy wool dress slacks after Christmas, when they go on sale at department stores.
sentences.chinese: 我通常会在圣诞节过后百货店减价时买些毛料休闲裤。

sentences.english: Excellent pure wool and you can have a touch.
sentences.chinese: 上等的纯毛料，你可以摸一下。

sentences.english: Wool is still the best bet in winter clothing .
sentences.chinese: 冬令服装仍以毛料最为理想。

sentences.english: Wool stands up better than silk.
Woolen clothes shrink in hot water.
sentences.chinese: 毛料衣服在热水中会收缩的。

sentences.english: Worsted suits are nice and warm.
Now that we have a new fabric supplier, we should resume production.
sentences.chinese: 现在有了新的毛料供应商，我们应该重新开始生产。

sentences.english: What you do with your woollen clothing is a matter of personal choice.
sentences.chinese: 你怎么处理你的毛料衣服，是你个人的事。

sentences.english: I would like to have a new suit made. something in a dark blue wool.
sentences.chinese: 我想做一套新衣服，用一种深蓝的毛料。

sentences.english: Woollen clothes often prickle my skin.
sentences.chinese: 毛料衣服常常刺痛我的皮肤。

definition: jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
